ygData.msgSnippet: Firedrill looked up, a serious flicker in his eye. Persecute, was not one of the words he liked to hear. I m with Torca on this one, your under our protection

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Firedrill looked up, a serious flicker in his eye. Persecute, was not
one of the words he liked to hear. "I'm with Torca on this one, your
under our protection now, and nobody has the right to hurt you for a
design." Firedrill was getting really upset. "I'll see to it." 

All Beachcomber could do, was looked at him in suprise. He knew
Firedrill felt strongly about certain things, but he didnt know he had
such a fire for the rights of people. If only Prime could see him, it
was that kind of warrior that kept them fighting, and not doubting their
cause.

All Cliffjumper could do was shake his head. He didnt like that Redhot
was related to Starscream. That name just burned a hole in his fuel
pump, but he couldnt hold that against him, no matter how much he wanted
to. "Cool it kid." he said reffering to Firedrill. "Okay guys, we need a
plan. We're all outcasts, of a sort, and right now we are vulnerable. We
need a base of operations, and a place to safely..." he paused, looking
at Redhot, "to repair Redhot."
